block.p: ANTOLOTTI--Louis ''Sonny'', 73, owner of Antolotti's Restaurant in Manhattan, resident of LaGrangeville and formerly of Manhasset Hills, died August 11,2006. Survivors include wife, Dorothy Kenny Antolotti; children, Patrice Antolotti Pappas, Kitty Antolotti, and John Antolotti;sisters, Joan Piscina and Barbara Costello; four grandchildren. Tuesday 2-4 and 79pm at McHoul Funeral Home Inc., Hopewell Jct., NY (845)221-2000. Funeral Wednesday 12pm St. Denis Church. Interment in St. Denis Cemetery.
